tool_description: This API provides access to a database of over 300,000 fights, as well as round by round stats, including strike numbers, for approximately 10,000 fights.
name: Complete MMA API
title: Complete MMA API

api_list.name: Search Fighters
api_list.description: Allows the user to search for a fighter by name in the database. Returns a list of the closest matches of the name, along with some information about the fighters returned, including their country, their weightclass, etc. to help the user determine the fighter they want.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Determines how many results are returned. Default value is 5 and max value is 20

api_list.name: Fight by ID
api_list.description: Gets stats for a fight, given the fight id. It returns, for each fighter, the fighter's name, their stats, and the result and method. Fight IDs can be found by using the Fighter by ID endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://complete-mma-api.p.rapidapi.com/fights/8fcdfee81cc604e3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "complete-mma-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://complete-mma-api.p.rapidapi.com/fights/{fight_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "complete-mma-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fighter by ID
api_list.description: Given a fighter id, returns their total stats (significant strikes, takedowns etc.) as well as all of their fights. If a fight has a 'stats_id', there are stats available for that fight, which can be used at the 'Fights by ID' endpoint. Stats are generally available for all UFC fights, and some fights from other large promoters.

url = "https://complete-mma-api.p.rapidapi.com/fighters/27944"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "complete-mma-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://complete-mma-api.p.rapidapi.com/fighters/{fighter_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
